title: La Moncloa. 08/05/2019. Nadia Calviño to become chair of European Bank of Reconstruction and Development's board of governors [Government/News]
snippet: 08 May 2019. The board of governors of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has officially appointed the Acting Minister for Economy and Business of Spain, Nadia Calviño, as its new chair.

title: Nadia Calviño
snippet: Nadia Calviño is the President of the European Investment Bank. She was appointed on 1 January 2024. Follow the President on

title: Spain’s Nadia Calviño wins fight to head EU Investment Bank | Euronews
snippet: Spain’s finance minister Nadia Calviño has been named next president of the European Investment Bank (EIB), resolving a fractious and long-running dispute among EU finance ministers.

title: Nadia Calviño named EIB chief – POLITICO
snippet: BRUSSELS – Spain's Finance Minister Nadia Calviño will become the next head of the European Investment Bank after EU countries agreed on Friday morning to her appointment.
